t:
I held his hand and kept running
through the forest. I never looked
back at the screams from behind,
not even once.



When I finally looked back,
I realised that his hand was
the only thing left of him.
c:
Now I know whose screams I heard. But at least his sacrifice will keep me safe for a few more days.



#forest #run #escape #unaware #fear #hand #lost #scream
